professional_summary: Seasoned Information Technology Professional with over 5 years of experience in software/database development and design, requirements gathering, and analysis. Proficient in Software Development Life-cycle (SDLC) and equipped with strong communication and problem-solving skills.

key_responsibilities: Develop browser-based applications for inventory management
sales
delivery
purchasing
and reporting using Python
ODOO
JavaScript
HTML
XML
Jquery
and CSS.
Provide end-user training and support via Help Desk and phone.
Work with Python bots to translate EDI 810 and ASNs into XML and JSON formats.
Write Python scripts to parse XML documents and load data into databases.
Use Pyflame for code profiling and optimization of the ERP system.
Utilize PostgreSQL log analysis tools for query optimization and database tuning.
Manage version control using GitLab and Mercurial.
Familiar with Linux environments and commands.
Implement Import/Export features in ERP modules.
Develop client code for consuming REST Web Services.
Design
develop
deploy
troubleshoot
and debug Frontend and Backend solutions.
Perform requirement gathering and analysis for client projects.
Contribute to the development of products through the software lifecycle.
Develop using object-oriented design.
Design database structures for web applications in PostgreSQL.
Prepare and analyze reports using Python libraries.
Attend ODOO and PostgreSQL technical training and develop applications using the ODOO framework.
Implement features such as user authentication and dynamic content management.
Develop and implement software solutions for law enforcement and judicial processes.
Design and optimize database schemas for large-scale data storage.
Create user-friendly interfaces for data retrieval and analysis.
